title: Liam Hemsworth uses his core to distract us from Miley Cyrus
text:
Liam Hemsworth evidently needs to calm down with his abs as he attempted to distract us all from Miley Cyrus kissing Cody Simpson.

That, or he was just really keen to show off his abs, perhaps?

The Aussie actor got to grips with some outdoor feats of strength on the weekend as he showcased just what those abs can do.

Gripping onto the side of a skip bin 29-year-old Liam lifted himself up and was holding his body horizontally with his abs keeping that rig rigid.

And it’s full-on.

Taking to Instagram the Hunger Games star turned away from the camera as he completed the move, sharing the pic for all of us to gawk at and feel a little like we needed to go to the gym and do about 329 sit-ups before lunch.

‘Start ya day out with a couple of these,’ the joker wrote in the caption.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘They’re super easy.’

Agreeing with us that they are, in fact, not super easy, the actor’s followers chimed into the comments section with their guffaws and smirks.

Liam and Miley split earlier this year (Picture: Rex Features)

One asked all the questions: ‘Do they have to be on a dumpster?!’

Comedian Adam DeVine simply wrote: ‘CGI’.

It comes after a fan shared footage of Liam’s former wife Miley kissing singer Cody online.

Miley has shared her thoughts about Cody (Picture: Instagram)

Miley had re-posted the image and later defended her new romance, after coming under fire for ‘moving on too quickly’. Last month, Miley announced her split from husband Liam Hemsworth, after a decade of dating and just eight months of marriage.

Facing criticism from some, Miley hit back at those ‘slut-shaming’ her, while venting her frustration over dating in the public eye.

She tweeted a lengthy message that won the support of Kendall Jenner and began: ‘I know the public feels invested in my past relationship because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning.

‘I think that’s why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they’ve watched me grow up. [sic]’

The singer also addressed the double standards in the entertainment industry towards women and men dating, stating her male counterparts rarely get ‘slut-shamed’ for their actions, while women are slated for moving on from a relationship quickly.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Get used to me dating – this is where I am at!’ she concluded.

Following her message overnight Cody shared a black and white snap of himself kissing Miley, after she made him breakfast before a swimming race he was competing at.

Affectionately calling the Wrecking Ball hit-maker his ‘baby’, Cody said: ‘Pre swim breakfast courtesy of baby.’

description: Is Liam Hemsworth trying to distract us from Miley Cyrus kissing Cody Simpson with his display of core strength?
